title: [Garden Of Light, Fountain]
description: Centered in the room is a golden marble water garden that surrounds a beautifully carved mermaid, water spouting from a blossom in her cupped hands.  A wide assortment of plants grow in the warm pool, their vibrant blossoms a kaleidoscope of color.  A small stone table is set to the side, its surface covered with a variety of metal wires and lengths of ribbon.
